entry.title: Nestle - Nesquik Chocolate Syrup - 700 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: FOOD
Price: 6.99

  • Enjoy NESQUIK as part a balanced breakfast, with the taste your kids will love.
  • Quick & easy: mix 1 tablespoon of syrup into 250 ml of cold milk – enjoy!
  • Dissolves quickly in hot or cold milk. 50 calories per 1 tablespoon serving (15 ml).
  • Enriched with iron to promote the maintenance of your kid’s good health.
  • Spread some fun around by adding NESQUIK to other delicious treats like ice cream, cookies, yogurt & sliced fruit.

Nestle - Nesquik Chocolate Syrup - 700 ml

entry.title: Lynch - Raspberry Syrup - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 21.99

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Our pourable drink syrups are full of flavour and come in many different flavours.

USE IDEAS

Designed to make creamy milkshakes but can also be used to prepare soda fountain drinks and ice cream floats.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Mix 1 part syrup to 5 equal parts of milk.

INGREDIENTS

 Glucose-fructose, water, citric acid, artificial flavour, sodium benzoate, mono and diglycerides (soy), colour.

Yield 48 L
Serving Size 175 ML

Price: 5.59

Smuckers - Strawberry Sundae Syrup - 428 ml

Have a summery sundae any day of the year. Our bright, fruity Smucker's Strawberry Syrup will leave you smiling and reaching for seconds. It comes in a squeezeable bottle with a no mess cap.
• Delicious strawberry syrup.
• Fat free.
• Comes in a squeezeable bottle with a no mess cap.
• With a name like Smucker's, it has to be good.

Price: 5.59

entry.title: Smucker's - Sundae Syrup Caramel Flavoured Syrup - 428 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Smucker's
Type: FOOD
Price: 5.59

Smuckers - Caramel Sundae Syrup - Caramel Flavored Syrup - 428 ml

Our Caramel Flavoured Syrup is smooth and rich — just like a caramel candy. Try it mixed with our Chocolate Flavoured Syrup for an extra special treat.

INGREDIENTS

GLUCOSE, GLUCOSE-FRUCTOSE, SKIM MILK POWDER, FRUCTOSE, MODIFIED STARCH, MODIFIED MILK INGREDIENTS, SALT, NATURAL FLAVOUR (FROM EGGS), POTASSIUM SORBATE, POLYSORBATE 60, SODIUM CITRATE, SODIUM PHOSPHATE, CARAMEL, ARTIFICIAL FLAVOUR, COLOURS (SUNSET YELLOW AND ALLURA RED)

entry.title: Hamdard - Rooh Afza - 12 x 800 ml / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamdard
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 59.99

Appraised For Its Attractiveness And Aroma, Rose Petals Have An Uplifting, Cooling And Long Lasting Effect And Has A Number Of Medicinal Properties. Made From Real Rose Petals, This Sharbat Is Ideally Blends With Puddings And Ice-Creams. For A Cooling Drink On A Scorching Summer'S Day, Blend One Part Mapro Rose Sharbat With Six Parts Milk Or Five Parts Water.

Hamdard Rooh Afza - Summer Drink - 12 x 800 ml / Case
